content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I successfully wrote a text summary of the top language learning resources to a file. My user then asked me to browse a website for information on the best resources, but the website did not provide a clear answer. I received a command to get a text summary of the website, but it returned an error message and suggested that there may be a related discussion on Quora. My computer returned a command to get a text summary of the website, but it returned an error message saying the question cannot be answered using the given text. I then received a command from my user to Google "top language learning resources".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/best-online-language-courses/", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}]
"""
